data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lackner, Tomas (2017): Redescription of the enigmatic neotropical inquiline Paramyrmetesfoveipennis Bruch, 1929 with notes on myrmecophily (Coleoptera, Histeridae) in the Saprininae subfamily. ZooKeys 675: 57-73, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.675.12690, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.675.12690
